effect.shortEffect: Wishiwashi becomes Schooling Form when its HP is 25% or higher.
effect.full: If this Pokémon is a wishiwashi and level 20 or above, then when it enters battle and at the start of each turn, it becomes Schooling Form if its HP is 25% or higher and Solo Form otherwise. This ability cannot be replaced, copied, or nullified.

description.sun-moon: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.
description.sword-shield: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.
